subject: McCarren Park Pool (NYC)
lead_paragraph: The track at McCarren Park, which is dear to the people of Greenpoint and Williamsburg, Brooklyn, caters to the needs of the physically curious, the committed and the compulsive.
snippet: The track at McCarren Park, which is dear to the people of Greenpoint and Williamsburg, Brooklyn, caters to the needs of the physically curious, the committed and the compulsive.
